game.name: Godly Corp
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 캡션 이용 가능, 통계, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: An intern in an intergalactic corporation managing the universe. Use your tentacle to perform unusual office tasks and try to not destroy all life on the planets you look after. Every day brings completely new challenges. Expect everything - chainsaw robots, bug infestation, space trips, and more.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An intern in an intergalactic corporation managing the universe. Use your tentacle to perform unusual office tasks and try to not destroy all life on the planets you look after. Every day brings completely new challenges. Expect everything - chainsaw robots, bug infestation, space trips, and more.

reviewHighlights.text: 그냥 키보드로 지구본 돌리고 촉수로 물주거나 광선쏘는 게임
